title: What were the speaking and writing abilities of Chanoine Mouls and how did they compare to those of other orators and writers?
first_phrase: In the preceding text, the narrator describes a man named Chanoine Mouls who was known for his passionate and often erratic speeches. Despite his bombastic style, listeners were moved by the sincerity of his convictions. The text goes on to discuss the complexities of spoken language and the power of masterful oratory. In the final part of the text, the narrator notes that Mouls' written works may not have been as noteworthy as his speeches, and admits that his publication on mesmerism was poorly organized. The narrator reflects on the importance of honesty, even when it comes to posthumous assessments of a person's achievements.
content: » Ces pensées profondes, cos expressions harmonieuses, ces nobles idées somptueusement vêtues, cette magie de mouvements imprévus, ces inspirations sublimes et triomphantes, qui clioz la plupart des hommes résultent d'un effort sensible, paraissent naître spontanément en d’exceptionnelles natures, et semblentjaillir de leur bouche, naturellement comme d’une source intarissable ! » Dans ce cas, il est vrai, la parole est presque toujours pareille à un torrent qui entraîne dans sa course déréglée les limons amassés sur son passage : ello enveloppe d’un même mouvement les insignifiances, les superfluités, les erreurs, avec les sages maximes, les réflexions judicieuses, les savantes leçons, les conseils salutaires. » La plume du chanoine Mouls était, comme sa parole, peut-être trop hâtée. Ello n’a produit aucun écrit vraiment remarquable, et sa volumineuse publication sur le mesmérisme n’est, je lo confesse, qu’une compilation insuffisamment ordonnée. On doit la vérité aux morts.
last_phrase: In conclusion, while the writing of the late Chanoine Mouls may not have produced any remarkable works, his writings display skill, finesse, and a deep knowledge of religious topics. Despite facing numerous trials, he remained steadfast in his beliefs, earning eternal honor and respect. Let us learn from his example of unwavering conviction and dedication to his principles.
